channel.title: Desolution 718/742 New Content Enjoy The Little Things
channel.description:
[b][i]To join Go to [url=http://www.desolution.org]Desolution[/url][/i][/b]
Desolution was suppose to be different from pvpscapez but That didn't happen as the other owner was a scammer Made the eco more stable. Made the server itself more stable
What its not Its not another mentios leech Made from a shitty base into Semi perfect Little to no black screens No npc nulls No object nulls No item def nulls No Corrupt staff Strict but nice owner What it has. And Source is clean / flawless and has Very minor bugs!
What we are working on. Better skills. To build the playerbase for more fun. I switched to 718/742 because alot of people been telling me to. I got great staff and am not looking for staff hunters of any kind. If you join and start complaining and asking for items from either Me or the co owner You will get either muted for 48 hours or jailed. I am trying to Increase my skills in java programming 10x So I am working with this for awhile. Hope to see you ingame I am a nice owner and Very Very active in my server which some people say that its good to be that. Time for some pictures!! At 15 players ima host a clan wars massacre In items on dropped clan wars match! Already started hosting and over 40 accs registered in 30 mins!
[URL=http://minus.com/lEbA8eAcKeVrE][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jEbA8eAcKeVrE.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/ljneGyVO6yM1A][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jjneGyVO6yM1A.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lvmYlcRXLBRNX][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jvmYlcRXLBRNX.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lENnQ30G2ak6I][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jENnQ30G2ak6I.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lbtTIX1S92P0kp][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbtTIX1S92P0kp.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/l0oTa4IfDLPTv][IMG]http://i.minus.com/j0oTa4IfDLPTv.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/l5hXTcxd7IfTJ][IMG]http://i.minus.com/j5hXTcxd7IfTJ.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lvx0emU7wlYA5][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jvx0emU7wlYA5.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lbzgEGnxJy6K6q][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbzgEGnxJy6K6q.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lbl5FBaujUpmDm][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbl5FBaujUpmDm.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lblUfRnY7J993a][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jblUfRnY7J993a.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lrdDKkDOvnQwr][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jrdDKkDOvnQwr.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lbyZRMYKS0uB3K][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbyZRMYKS0uB3K.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/l9bUX304rZAgM][IMG]http://i.minus.com/j9bUX304rZAgM.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lVF6vG71KWmo6][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jVF6vG71KWmo6.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/l13tBLpNwY3XA][IMG]http://i.minus.com/j13tBLpNwY3XA.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lB2aVQiCsq2jR][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jB2aVQiCsq2jR.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lv1wCGJa4r49g][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jv1wCGJa4r49g.png[/img][/URL]

[quote=“kidgoku4522, post:1, topic:518640”]@Flame No this is not This is deathlypvpz v2 with alot of modifications epicurus was boring and dull so i let it go
And someone hacked my vps and started giving out free copy’s of It so like 90000000 people has the fixed copy now[/quote]
Ok, thanks for clarifying.
Good luck with your server.
